description:
Heroes, unite! Villains, rise!

The Ultraman DLC adds 4 new playable characters from the Ultraman universe: Ultraman, Ultraman Tiga, Alien Baltan and Camearra! Each of them features unique movesets and iconic abilities as seen on screen.

Will you become an Ultra-Hero or join the galactic villains to destroy our world? Or will you play as your favorite GigaBash Titan and team up with the legends that inspired the Tokusatsu genre?
name: Ultraman 4 Characters Pack
